entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 27 February 2023
